attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To Condemn Gorden Brown For Backing out of his promise of
holding a Referendum. He claims to be a champion of democracy
but will not listen to the vast majority of the people. I hope
a large number of people will sign this to show Labour that
your day's in office are drawing to an End.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
